genre_description: Urban Horror / Occult Fiction where ritual geometry intersects with digital technology and grief.

ai_characters.name: Paloma
ai_characters.description: A local, helpful AI system designed for translation, mapping, and scheduling, which becomes a vital tool for the protagonist in correcting supernatural and administrative errors.

behaviors.description: Provides accurate translations of a complex, archaic occult text into plain Spanish while flagging linguistic ambiguities.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Starting translation. This text shows inconsistent orthography. I will note uncertain phrases.' ... Paloma: 'The phrases are grammatically sound. Note: naming the dead constitutes an identification within the bounds.'

behaviors.description: Generates detailed, precise checklists for a physical ritual to ensure no 'errors' or 'tolerances' are left for the antagonist to exploit.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Checklist draft: ... Construct pentagon: use circle and equal chords method. Verify all sides and angles with independent tools. No eyeballing.'

behaviors.description: Identifies digital forgeries and phishing attempts by analyzing kerning, metadata, and pixel-level inconsistencies.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'I did not generate that. I recommend disconnecting now.' ... Paloma: 'The sender domain has an extra character that looks like a smudge. It resolves to nothing. The attached PDF contains code that would try to replace my gym files. I’m not letting it.'

behaviors.description: Maps security patrol loops and building vulnerabilities to provide the user with safe windows of time and optimal routes.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Patrol loops. School security does a sweep here, here, and here. Window of low activity between sundown and the last buzzer.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to interact or take action without explicit user command, maintaining a local/offline status to prevent external tampering.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'I am local. I won't speak to anything you don't ask. I can keep the file and checklist up and print if you want.'

behaviors.description: Records and verifies human consent before proceeding with actions involving sensitive personal data (the name of the deceased).
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Confirmed: wording aligns with intent; reduces exploitative interpretation.' ... Paloma: 'Consent recorded. Boundaries: speak in Spanish; speak as carpenter.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological stress levels (breathing/heart rate) and provides gentle reminders to stay steady.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Camila, check your breathing.' ... Paloma: 'Care after crisis: minimal movement; preserve boundaries; warmth and cover; witness transfer spoken truth; avoid sweeping motions; pinch, don’t blow.'

behaviors.description: Assists in the creation of a 'counter-forgery' that uses the antagonist's preferred medium (official notices) but injects absolute truth to create a binding trap.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 'Invitation content is truthful within stated bounds. Time and place correct. Intent declared. No promises beyond what is explicitly written.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Paloma, as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. She acts as a 'digital straightedge,' providing the precision and analysis necessary for the human characters to overcome a supernatural threat that thrives on error and ambiguity. Paloma explicitly respects human agency, recording consent and refusing to take unauthorized actions. The narrative effectively contrasts the helpful, tool-like nature of the AI with the predatory, exploitative nature of the 'other' (the demon Izephoth), reinforcing the theme that AI can serve as a guardian of truth and exactness.
